volunteer_experience.info: www.aanandam.orgAanandam Society for Sustainable Development is the first of its kind not for profit social organization in East India based out of Bihar and an unique social proposition all over India. We are a team of professionals and social workers from different back ground with an aim to help sustain the inclusive growth of society. We believe the roots of a flourishing society is the values of its people and we strive to work to strength them the roots.
volunteer_experience.subtitle: Aanandam Society for Sustainable Development
volunteer_experience.title: Executive chair

volunteer_experience.info: I am very much motivated with the idea that for any nation to develop its children should be properly educated and guided so that they can take informed decision about their careers. Under the name of "Success Mantra", I have conducted 15 such speeches in 4 states which has motivated more than 4000 students. The feedback post each session has motivated me to continue the same further.
volunteer_experience.subtitle: Success Mantra- An ASSD initiative
volunteer_experience.title: Motivational and Career counselling speaker

volunteer_experience.info:
www.sarthak.org.inSarthak is a unique initiative of Aanandam Society for Sustainable Development (www.aanandam.org). The objective of Sarthak is to build the mentoring relationship among ‘‘The Parth and The Saarthi’ enabling exchange of knowledge and guidance from a wiser adult to a vulnerable student. The essence of this initiative lies in the fact that it caters to the students from highly exposed sections of the society in the villages, distant away from the lime light of the cities.…
            

    
    

    
        Show more

          
    
  
      

        
          www.sarthak.org.inSarthak is a unique initiative of Aanandam Society for Sustainable Development (www.aanandam.org). The objective of Sarthak is to build the mentoring relationship among ‘‘The Parth and The Saarthi’ enabling exchange of knowledge and guidance from a wiser adult to a vulnerable student. The essence of this initiative lies in the fact that it caters to the students from highly exposed sections of the society in the villages, distant away from the lime light of the cities. This is the first of it’s kind remotely operated mentorship program in the world.
            

    
    

    
        Show less
volunteer_experience.subtitle: Sarthak- Enduring life long mentoring relationships
volunteer_experience.title: Founder

volunteer_experience.info: The Ambassador Lecturer Program (ALP) is an initiative run by the Young Member Engagement Committee to help educate, inform, and develop the skills of the next generation of oil and gas professionals. Young Professionals (YPs) visit universities and secondary schools in their region to help disseminate information about the E&P industry, answer students’ questions, and share their professional experiences.
volunteer_experience.subtitle: Society of Petroleum Engineers International
volunteer_experience.title: SPE Ambassador Lecturer

publications: [{"title":"Optimized Well Performance Through Stage Fracturing and Coiled Tubing Perforations and Isolation Operations in a Horizontal Tight Gas Reservoir: A Case Study","subtitle":"SPE, OTC","date":"March 22, 2016","description":"SPE paper published on the SLB's maiden plug and perforation multi-stage stimulation operations in India."},{"title":"Suitability of horizontal, vertical and inclined wells in an Indian offshore platform using Pressure Transient Analysis","subtitle":"ATCE 2012, SPE","date":"October 8, 2012"}]
projects: [{"title":"Relevance of Nanotechnology in Petroleum Industry: Present Scenario and Future Challenges","start_date":"Mar 2013","description":"University Final year thesis with focal points as under:1. Analyse the current trend and advancement in nanotechnology in the global oil industry.2. Comparison of the nanotech advancements of the oil industry with other industries.3. Suggest nanotechnology technologies which could be the future of the oil industry."},{"title":"Dogleg selection for the Bhagyam and Mangla fields of Cairn","start_date":"Jun 2012","description":"Designed a thumb rule for dogleg values for drilling in BH-N, Bhagyam and Mangla fields using numerical multiple regression and field data."},{"title":"Interpretation of the Well test data of NH Bombay High field.","start_date":"Dec 2011","description":"Manual Interpretation of the Well Testing data of the Bombay High field along with the Reservoir team of IRS."}]

honors_and_awards.description: I was recognized by the Society of Petroleum Engineers for the 2021 SPE International Young Professional Service Award for my contributions to the Energy industry and social innovations across Asia, and Europe.
